title: My friend can not log in to his account
body:
So my Friend (ThompsonG) had not played league of legends for 21 days, then he came back and tried to log in to his account but it did not let him, it said that his user name and password had an issue. I have read all the possible problems with logging in and none of them line up to any problems that he has. I also tried to log in to his account but it did not work. He is on a windows 10 i am on a mac. any help would be appreciated
Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like your friends account may have been compromised and his password changed, your friend is going to have to [submit an account recovery request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support.
ok, he did this and it actually turns out his account was banned, i can assure you he did not do anything to get banned, he hadnt played in about 20 days.
